name: Sylvain Fourre
comment: I remember I had lovely evening at pub with your entertainment you are great talented artists Jenny pure voice and David great guitarist hopefuly see you soon over there.

name: Marion Roulettes
comment: Jenny et David forment un superbe duo ensemble. Si vous passez par Londres, je vous conseille fortement de vous renseigner sur leur dates de concert ! Vous passerez forcément une bonne soirée.

name: Aurore
comment: I went to see Jenny & David perform several times, that's always a pleasure! They are so talented, full of good energy. Simply amazing.

name: Colin
comment: I was immediately impressed by them, dynamic, entertaining, perfect for any occasion.

name: Viktoria
comment: Such wonderful artists! We are working together for many years now as they are playing in our restaurants. I recommend them very highly!

name: lau
comment: It’s always a pleasure to hear Jenny’s amazing voice. We can’t get tired of your performances and I cannot wait till the next one. A talent that can’t be explained with words. Thank you.

name: Robert Beveridge
comment: Jenny and David came to play at our garden party and enchanted our guests! They have a wide repertoire and were very professional and friendly. Highly recommended.

name: Daniel Reynoldson
comment: Two of the loveliest most talented musicians you’ll ever want to meet that I am privileged to call friends.

name: Sofia
comment: We had a great time listening to both of you while eating on Valentine's Day.

name: Catherine
comment: La 1ère fois où on a entendu chanter Jenny, quelle émotion ! Elle nous donne des frissons à chaque fois qu'elle chante et humainement elle est au top. Avec David ils font un duo magique.
